description:
Haruno and the Cinephoto Club head to Nagano for a two-night-three-day trip for a scoop. While everyone raises their hand to suggest places they want to go to, An says she wants to film some skateboarding downhill with an action camera. To do this, though, they`ll need someone to ride the skateboard with her....
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Nagano / Toyama Trip That`s on the Test (The First Night)
Shiken ni Deru Nagano Toyama no Tabi: Dai 1 Ya
試験に出る長野・富山の旅 第1夜
